reviewText: I wish there was a little less skying and a little more Wyoming. All-in-all this is a good documentary. However, I was disturbed by the foul language in the soundtrack. It took away from the story.

Fabulous video and great adventure.  I had to get one for each of my outdoorsy guys.  I hope more become available as I am sure some of them will "borrow" the one I have in my own collection and I will be required to purchase another.

This is a great short film that focuses on skiing in Wyoming.  The skiers are great and the scenery is typical Wyoming with all the beauty nature has to offer and some great wildlife.  This is truly a great short film.
